title: Deshaun Watson Reaction; Everyone is a Bust (Part One) (08/01 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Deshaun Watson has been handed a six game suspension, subject to appeal. We react to the big news. Jamey is higher on Watson than Dave is. Why is Dave a little hesitant to buy in? Does this change anything for the rest of the Browns (8:15)? Is Amari Cooper a Round 5 pick now? ... We tell you about the biggest news from over the weekend (15:45). Within this, we debate Javonte Williams vs. Ezekiel Elliott before getting into more news (20:15) that Fantasy managers need to know ... Everyone is a Bust! We make cases against the Top 6 players in Fantasy! Do we buy these bust cases? We talk about Jonathan Taylor (33:15) and Christian McCaffrey followed by Austin Ekeler (41:10), Cooper Kupp (45:50), Justin Jefferson (48:55) and Derrick Henry (52:30) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, 
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
